message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at $12,000. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $12,000 is already a very competitive price for this product and its value.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $9,800. Can you consider this price?
